description: Test your turns without regrets. The Panterra 75 GW prioritizes comfort for female skiers without compromising stability. With a softer flex, these accessible boots move with less effort, so you can ski all day. The sculpted liners can be skied out of the box, or thermo-moulded for an instantly personalized fit.  Using the boot's micro-adjust buckles, you can tweak your boot tightness whenever you need to. As long as the lifts are running, keep skiing in comfort.Lightweight PU shell construction reduces weight.Power Cage design transmits power to the ski and stabilizes the leg.Cabrio 3 piece shell design flexes consistently and absorbs shock.Variable Volume Fit allows adjustment of the forefoot width.Contour 4 Fit Technology fits securely while allowing extra room where needed.My Fit system offers customizable fit at the shell and liner.Adjustable rear cuff lets you customize the boot's height to your calf.Dynalink heel strap keeps the foot from sliding.Grip Walk soles allow nearly-normal walking with a rockered design.Dura-grip replaceable heels and toes.
name: Dalbello Panterra 75 W GW Ski Boots
